price: Ɔsoro reyε asunsuan wᴐ ho na asaase nso reyε apaepae ama mmepͻ nso abubu gͻsͻgͻsͻ,
arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-arḍu watakhirru al-jibālu haddan
